title: What The Cannabis Industry Can Learn From Pharma With Martin Tindall, Phoenix Life Sciences
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Martin Tindall is the CEO and Director of Phoenix Life Sciences. He joins Rena Sherbill to discuss Phoenix's recently completed audits, federal deregulation, targeting diabetes treatment in the South Pacific and why branding should move away from old school imagery. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
